replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the swimsuit and [npc.verb(pull)] it up to cover [npc.her] torso.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc2.name] into the swimsuit and [npc.verb(pull)] it up over [npc2.her] torso.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(guide)] [npc2.name] into the swimsuit and [npc.verb(yank)] it up over [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the swimsuit's straps down [npc.her] [npc.arms] and [npc.verb(tug)] it off [npc.her] [npc.legs].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the swimsuit's straps down [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] and [npc.verb(tug)] it off [npc2.her] [npc2.legs].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] the swimsuit's straps down [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] and [npc.verb(tug)] it off [npc2.her] [npc2.legs].

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the top half of [npc.her] swimsuit.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the top half of [npc2.namePos] swimsuit.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down the top half of [npc2.namePos] swimsuit.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] swimsuit up into its correct position.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] swimsuit up into its correct position.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] swimsuit up into its correct position.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the lower part of [npc.her] swimsuit to one side.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the lower part of [npc2.namePos] swimsuit to one side.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the lower part of [npc2.namePos] swimsuit to one side.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the lower part of [npc.her] swimsuit back into its correct position.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the lower part of [npc2.namePos] swimsuit back into its correct position.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the lower part of [npc2.namePos] swimsuit back into its correct position.
